title: Bedroom available near Tufts campus
posting_body: One bedroom in four bedroom available September 1.
Remaining roommates are 28, 31, and 33, cop, grad student, and personal trainer, respectively.
Apartment is a great deal for the price.
Spacious common areas, two full bathrooms, two porches, and (moderately) well-maintained backyard.
Street parking is available, driveway spots are taken by the current tenants.
Rent is $800 per month with $800 security deposit.
Utilities are split among the four tenants.
Average is probably $75 per month, but as high as $200 in winter.
*You must purchase bed frame and bureau from current tenant for $100*
You can do whatever you want with these: use, sell, melt down, use for art project, etc.
